[vc_cta text="Frequently Asked Questions" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" align="center" heading_sep="yes" tag="h2" h2="Frequently Asked Questions" txt_align="center" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""][/vc_cta]
[vc_accordion active_tab=”false”][vc_accordion_tab title=”Where is Doctors’ Hospital Sseguku located?” tab_id=”1580815747-1-76″][vc_column_text]Doctors’ Hospital  Sseguku is located 10 km along Kampala – Entebbe road, In Sseguku, Wakiso District, Uganda.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”When is immunization done?” tab_id=”1580815747-2-75″][vc_column_text]Vaccination under the Uganda National Expanded Program on Immunisation (UNEPI) is scheduled every Wednesday and Sunday of the week from 9:00 am – 4:00 pm, Unable to come on Wednesday. Please come on Sunday. Vaccination against other communicable diseases is available every day of the week.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”What Insurance partners are available at Doctors Hospital Sseguku?”][vc_column_text]The major Insurance partners card in Uganda are accepted at the Hospital and these include ICEA Uganda, UAP, Minet, Case Medical Care, Prudential, Jubilee and Liberty[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Do you have a dental clinic?”][vc_column_text]Yes we have a dental Cinic at Doctors Hospitial.Our dental clinic is equipped to provide a complete range of treatment including;

  • General dentistry, childern’s dentistry,
  • Restorative services(fillings / cement)
  • Proffessional cleaning,
  • Root canal therapy,
  • Artifical teeth replacement (Bridges, Dentures, crowning), and Extractions.

Open Hours

Mon – Fri    8am -7pm

SAT              9am – 1pm[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”What are your visiting hours?”][vc_column_text]Visiting hours at Doctors’ Hospital Sseguku are from 6: 00 am to 8: 00 am in the morning, 12:00 noon to 2:00 pm and in the evening from 4: 00 pm to 10:00 pm[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
